subdisciplines.name: Film Studies
subdisciplines.description: The academic study of film history, theory, and criticism, with an emphasis on the artistic and social significance of cinema.

subdisciplines.name: TV Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the history, theory, and social significance of television as a medium of mass communication and popular culture.

subdisciplines.name: Games Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of video games as a cultural phenomenon, including their design, development, and social impact.
